strings.heading: Ovary
strings.description: The enlarged basal portion of the pistil that contains the ovulesand, after fertilization, develops into a fruit enclosing seeds

strings.heading: Style
strings.description: A long, slender stalk-like structure within a flower that connects the stigma to the ovary

strings.heading: Stigma
strings.description: The receptive surface at the tip of the pistil where pollen lands and germinates, initiating the fertilization process.

strings.heading: Pistil
strings.description: The female reproductive part of a flower, typically located in the center
